errors.title: Greed Over Generosity
errors.the_error: We hoard. We accumulate. We take. We keep.
errors.the_correction: We share. We give. We serve. We love.
errors.impact: Creates poverty. Creates inequality. Creates suffering.

errors.title: Pride Over Humility
errors.the_error: We are proud. We are superior. We are better.
errors.the_correction: We are humble. We are equal. We are one.
errors.impact: Creates division. Creates conflict. Creates suffering.

errors.title: Hate Over Love
errors.the_error: We hate. We divide. We destroy. We kill.
errors.the_correction: We love. We unite. We build. We serve.
errors.impact: Creates war. Creates suffering. Creates death.

errors.title: Deception Over Honesty
errors.the_error: We lie. We deceive. We hide. We manipulate.
errors.the_correction: We tell truth. We are honest. We reveal. We serve.
errors.impact: Creates confusion. Creates distrust. Creates suffering.

errors.title: Indifference Over Compassion
errors.the_error: We ignore. We neglect. We abandon. We forget.
errors.the_correction: We care. We help. We serve. We love.
errors.impact: Creates suffering. Creates isolation. Creates death.

errors.title: Violence Over Peace
errors.the_error: We fight. We kill. We destroy. We war.
errors.the_correction: We make peace. We protect. We build. We serve.
errors.impact: Creates war. Creates death. Creates suffering.

errors.title: Exploitation Over Stewardship
errors.the_error: We exploit. We destroy. We consume. We waste.
errors.the_correction: We steward. We protect. We preserve. We serve.
errors.impact: Creates destruction. Creates pollution. Creates suffering.

errors.title: Separation Over Unity
errors.the_error: We separate. We divide. We exclude. We isolate.
errors.the_correction: We unite. We include. We connect. We serve.
errors.impact: Creates division. Creates conflict. Creates suffering.
